extensionDescription.message: Allows to select, deselect, inverse selection of courses in a Moodle administration page.

cocherAlert.message:
n+' boxes have been checked
'+c+' were already ticked
'+d+' were unticked
'+t+' = total'

decocherAlert.message:
n+' boxes have been unchecked
'+c+' were already ticked
'+d+' were unticked
'+t+' = total

(check console for detail)'

inverserAlert.message:
n+' boxes have been inversed
'+c+' were already ticked
'+d+' were unticked
'+t+' = total

(check console for detail)'

chercherListeAlert.message:
n+' codes have been searched
'+tr+'  found
'+ntr+' not found
-----
'+c+' were already ticked
'+d+' were unticked
'+t+' in total'

afficherAlert.message: n+' courses have been displayed and memorised'

errorContent.message: Can't select courses on this web page. Try a different page.
